description:
Did you know that hemp is naturally bacteria-resistant, quick-drying, and produces more fiber per acre than trees or cotton? True story. And one that comes to life in prana's men's Cardiff Fleece Crew.

This fleece has all the feels ... a vintage-like vibe that gives it a delightfully worn-in fit, the natural performance of hemp, and a good origin story to boot. And if all that's not enough, we think you're going to love the simple-yet refined silhouette of this basic crew.
name: Prana Cardiff Fleece Crew - Mens
